author: peter.davies
content: It is possible we will add long addresses prior to switching to verkle tries. Overloading the nonce field was the easiest way to do it that was completely agnostic to merkle vs verkle tries. With verkle tries we could add a new field `longAddressTranslation`, but I can't see a way to do that straightforwardly under merkle tries.

author: axic3354
content:
In the document we shared we also had this idea:
> Instead of a map, have new account entries working as symlink? i.e. the account entry would not contain nonce/balance/code/storage, but a single field for the destination longaddress

author: axic3354
content:
Additionally here's a huge list of test cases collected by <@!275684146658148352>: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ipsilon/rk8C21p9_

It would be useful to replay these test cases on other proposals (not only the translation table), and see how they work with it.
